summary: A sexy restyle of the Daedric Armor, being as its evil and evil women are usually portrayed as sexy vixens in hollywood, i figured it needed some skin, however, i\'m new to this and this is my first.
descriptionHtml:
before i go anywhere with this i must give Caliente credit for his beautiful body mesh that i used for the skin parts, the mod is at http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

Caliente has revised version 0.06 and made it into a working version 1.0, am hoping for someone who can nail this restyle with the red fx and proper bones, Caliente mentioned something about a skirt bone, i noticed some clipping issues around the butt region under the skirt too, i\'ll look into fixing that.

to install:
rename file to say \"daedrictorsof_0.nif\"

might require CBBE not sure though.
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
author: Kamikazi2142

files.name: Sexy Daedric Version1_0 RAR
files.changelogHtml: Caliente revised the original file and made it playable in game.
